form.label: Cron Toolkit - Scheduled Search Analysis - Individual
form.description: Analyze cron schedules for specific saved searches.

search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches splunk_server=local search="disabled=0" search="is_scheduled=1" | dedup eai:acl.app | fields eai:acl.app
| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches splunk_server=local search="disabled=0" search="is_scheduled=1" search="eai:acl.app=\"$app_name$\"" | dedup eai:acl.owner | fields eai:acl.owner
